name: Jumper Men
description:
This game was made somewhere around 2009 or 2010, when I was only 13 years old. You may find it lacks some of the polish that I've learned to incorporate in my newer creations.

The goal is to survive against missiles, walking enemies, acorns, bats, and everything else that comes to kill you. Protect the green smiling guy as much as you can, if he exits the screen safely, the next one who comes will give you an extra heart. Game features 2 player (hotseat) modes as well.

Controls: Arrow keys, WASD (for player 2)
